name: Twisted Carbz
description:
THE OFFICIAL VIDEOGAME OF THE SHOVELWAREHOUSE STREAM, WHICH YOU SHOULD CHECK OUT BY CLICKING HERE

I am Zed, of the ShovelWareHouse. I play terrible videogames. Just so that I wasn't a hypocrite, I decided to also make a terrible videogame. And because I stream myself playing terrible videogames, I also streamed the creation of this... monstrosity.

Please play it, so that you can appreciate what a bad videogame really is. Thank you.

CONTROLS:

Move with the arrow keys, jump with shift, shoot with left CTRL, press Escape to stop the pain (end the game), or press 'R' at any point to restart.
